alert.note: Alert for Brooks; Lowndes (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 15 at 9:56AM EST until February 19 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Georgia... Withlacoochee River near Quitman (US 84) affecting Brooks and Lowndes Counties. For the Withlacoochee River...including Quitman (US 84)...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Withlacoochee River near Quitman (US 84). * WHEN...From this afternoon to Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...At 106.0 feet, In Lowndes County, the boat ramp at the Clyattville Nankin road is flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM EST Wednesday the stage was 103.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this afternoon to a crest of 105.8 feet Friday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 104.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 106.0 feet on 02/19/2004. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 400 AM EST.
